key.name: move-focus-left
key.summary: Move focus to window on left

key.name: move-focus-right
key.summary: Move focus to window on right

key.name: switch-to-new-workspace-down
key.summary: Insert new workspace down and switch to it

key.name: move-to-new-workspace-down
key.summary: Move window to new workspace down (and focus it)

key.name: move-to-workspace-up-anywhere
key.summary: Move window to workspace up (but it also works in overview)

key.name: move-to-workspace-down-anywhere
key.summary: Move window to workspace down (but it also works in overview)
